title: Coppelius: 1803, To My Creator, Time-Zeit, Tumult

Coppelius is a German band which plays metal on drums, double bass, cello and clarinet. Their name is taken from E.T.A. HoffmannÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Der Sandmann. Their logo is a top hat and they wear formal, old-fashioned clothes onstage.
